mapper.select: SELECT PC.ID , PC.NAME , PC.DISTRICT_ID , PC.POPULATION FROM PPOG_CITIES PC WHERE PC.DEL_FLG = 'approved' AND ( PC.ID LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NUMERIC} OR PC.NAME LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} ) ORDER BY PC.ID OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
